name: FEDERATION OF EUROPEAN DENTAL COMPETENT AUTHORITIES AND REGULATORS
goal:
We bring together European orders, chambers and public bodies responsible for the regulation, the registration and the supervision of dental practitioners.
We share information and good practices on the regulation of dentists and aim at promoting common positions to the EU legislator regarding initiatives and legislation at European level which affect the regulation of dental professionals.
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Education, Enlargement, Environment, General and Institutional Affairs, Internal Market, Public Health, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
SINGLE MARKET
PUBLIC HEALTH
PROFESSIONAL REGULATIONS
CONSUMER PROTECTION
ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION
DATA PROTECTION
TRADE AGREEMENTS
INSTITUTIONAL DEVELOPMENTS
BREXIT
